SimilarGroups.SimilarityNote: Both requirements focus on aspects that enhance system maintainability and adaptability to future needs.
SimilarGroups.DifferenceNote: Requirement 1 emphasizes architectural scalability, while Requirement 2 focuses on compliance and audit capabilities.

UnifiedRequirement.Name: Scalable and Compliant Architecture
UnifiedRequirement.Description: The system shall be built on a scalable architecture that supports the integration of additional health monitoring devices and features, while also maintaining comprehensive audit logs for all user and system interactions to ensure compliance.
